Headline: Denmark’s Eriksen still in hospital, condition is stable, says Danish FA | Sports | Malay Mail

Denmark's Christian Eriksen is currently being hospitalised for further examination. ― Reuters pic

Follow us on Instagram and subscribe to our Telegram channel for the latest updates.COPENHAGEN, June 13 — Denmark midfielder Christian Eriksen remained in hospital and was in stable condition today, after collapsing during his side’s Euro 2020 opening match with Finland and being given CPR on the pitch yesterday, the Danish football association said.“This morning we have spoken to Christian Eriksen, who has sent his greetings to his teammates. His condition is stable, and he continues to be hospitalised for further examination,” Danish FA DBU said on Twitter. — ReutersLoading...© 2021, Malay Mail, All Rights Reserved.
